entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -38.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 08:13 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -38.9°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -42.7°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow ending late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
